page.title: 07KENILWORTH CASTLE TODAY.
page.content: KENILWORTH CASTLE.{Dating}back to the {Norman period of English history}the {castle today}stands as a constant {reminder}of our splendid{heritage. Apart from the{thousands of tourists it attracts the{Castle is used}for a {variety of purposes}by the{townspeople throughout the year. The{Town Council hold both{Public Assemblies}and {Official Receptions}as well as most of its{Council Meetings}in{Leicester's {Gatehouse.}The{Great Barn}has recently been completely{renovated}and now houses a{Museum. Plans}to incorporate a{Teaching Centre}into the building are well advanced as are{plans}to use the{Barn}for large public events. {Outdoor events}held in the grounds include the town's annual{May Fair,}a {Schools' Dance Festival,}a{Christmas {Carol Service}and others are{regular {features}in the{town's calendar.
